hero.subtitle: Master in Corporate Finance Student
hero.title: Yanis Touloum
hero.description: Grande École Program at <bsb>BSB</bsb>. Specialization in Financial Mathematics. Seeking an <audit>audit</audit> internship starting July 2026.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: After a <prepClass>preparatory class (ECT)</prepClass> that gave me a solid foundation in economics, law, and management, I joined <bsbLink>BSB's Grande École Program</bsbLink> with a growing passion for finance.
about.paragraph2: My professional experiences, particularly at <vertMarine>Vert Marine</vertMarine> and <chronopost>Chronopost</chronopost>, have allowed me to develop a rigorous approach to control and audit. Each mission has strengthened my conviction that precision and methodology are the keys to excellence.
about.paragraph3: Today, I am preparing to take on new challenges in <audit>audit</audit>, convinced that my academic training and field experience will enable me to bring <value>significant added value</value>.
about.quote: I believe that audit is not just a control, but a lever for transformation and continuous improvement for organizations.

achievements.title: Experiences
achievements.subtitle: Projects and missions that illustrate my methodological approach and my ability to create value.

financialModeling.title: Financial Modeling
financialModeling.description: Development of a complete DCF model to assess the viability of strategic investments. In-depth analysis of cash flows and calculation of net present value with sensitivity to key variables.

cashControl.title: Cash Control
cashControl.description: Design and implementation of a double-check protocol for cash closing, integrating cross-checks and complete traceability. Training the team on new procedures.

logisticsTraceability.title: Logistics Traceability
logisticsTraceability.description: Ensuring complete traceability of shipments via the LYM system. Coordination of flows and implementation of quality control procedures to ensure a flawless logistics chain.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Technical and methodological skills developed throughout my training and professional experiences.

vision.title: Professional Vision
vision.paragraph1: Audit represents for me the perfect balance between analytical rigor and strategic vision. It is a field that requires both sharp technical mastery and the ability to understand business challenges in their entirety.
vision.paragraph2: My goal is to join an audit team where I can leverage my excellent academic training and field experience to contribute to the financial reliability of organizations, while developing expertise that will allow me to evolve toward management responsibilities in the long term.
vision.paragraph3: I believe that modern audit must evolve toward a more consultative approach, offering not only findings but also concrete improvement solutions. My ambition is to continue learning and evolving in a demanding environment, actively contributing to the success of teams and projects entrusted to me.

personality.title: Values
personality.subtitle: The principles that guide my professional and personal approach.

rigor.title: Rigor
rigor.description: Regular meditation practice to develop optimal concentration and mental rigor essential in complex financial analysis.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: Active volunteering in homework help, developing my skills in pedagogy and communication. Sharing knowledge and transmitting values.

openness.title: Openness
openness.description: Passion for travel and football, sources of open-mindedness, cultural curiosity, and team spirit. Experience of a global vision of challenges.

personality.conclusion: I firmly believe that professional excellence comes through a balance between technical skills and personal development. My extra-professional commitments enrich my approach to work and strengthen essential qualities in audit: rigor, patience, communication, and team spirit.

footer.title: Contact
footer.description: Seeking an Audit internship (6 months) starting July 2026. Let's discuss how my expertise can contribute to your goals.
footer.exchangeDescription: I would be delighted to discuss my skills and the value I could bring to your team.
